pages.text: Industrial tools for industrial players. Note that upon upgrading, the energy and enchantments of the tools will be kept.
Works like a diamond pickaxe and diamond shovel in one. Can also mine 3x3 areas (try sneak-use).
Works like a faster diamond pickaxe, but only on non-ore blocks. Can also mine 5x5 areas (try sneak-use).
Works like a diamond axe, but without durability. Can also fell entire trees (try sneak-use).
